subtitles.text: Thank you for watching

Akimoto, who has seen off the graduation of all the members up to now, is now at the peak of her tearfulness, even though it is her own graduation.
So the junior members challenged Akimoto to make her cry by any means necessary. If Akimoto could make her cry within the time limit, the junior members would get a reward.
However, Akimoto knew about the plan, and he secured the reward if the junior members shed tears.

Congratulations on your graduation. At first, I was worried about entering this world and was against it, but now...

I've been so happy to be a part of this wonderful group called Nogizaka46. I've decided for years that my last summer tour would be a nationwide tour, so last year's tour was a great opportunity for me to go all over the country with my dad.
You went all over the country with my dad. When I saw fans, I thanked them from the bottom of my heart.
You have a long life ahead of you after you graduate from Nogizaka46. Nacchan is a girl who has her own ideas, so please believe in yourself and keep going.
